Let's see if we can find the pattern that connects each number.

$4\overset{\blueD?}{{\rightarrow}}24\overset{\blueD?}{\rightarrow} 44 \overset{\blueD?}{\rightarrow} 64$

The pattern is to start at $4$ and add $20$ each time.

$4\overset{\blueD{+~ 20}}{{\longrightarrow}}24\overset{\blueD{+~ 20}}{\longrightarrow} 44 \overset{\blueD{+~ 20}}{\longrightarrow} 64$
The rule for the pattern $4, 24, 44, 64$ is start with $4$ and $\blueD {\text{add } 20}$ each time.
